message.name: ERR_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_NAMEALREADYEXISTS
message.locale: This document template name already exists. Please chose another name.

message.name: ERR_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_IDALREADYEXISTS
message.locale: The Template Document ID you entered already exists on the system. Please chose another ID.

message.name: ERR_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_AN_UNEXPECTED_CHARACTER_ENCOUNTERED
message.locale: An unexpected character is encountered on decoding of Base64 data for document template.
